message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While $9,500 is slightly below my initial asking price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $11,750?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $11,750. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in purchasing the product, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
